g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;

                       , o_rt_pst   OUT bsis_party_status%ROWTYPE )

;

                           , o_rt_pst   OUT bsis_party_status%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

;

;

;

RETURN NUMBER
;

RETURN BOOLEAN
;


END bsis_pst_tapi_pck;

package body bsis_pst_tapi_pck
is




function pst_select_row( i_pst_pty_id   in  bsis_party_status.pty_id%type
                       , o_rt_pst   out bsis_party_status%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pst_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_pst ( i_pst_pty_id   in  bsis_party_status.pty_id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from bsis_party_status pst
            where pst.pty_id = i_pst_pty_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_pst( i_pst_pty_id => i_pst_pty_id );
         fetch c_pst into o_rt_pst;
         l_found := c_pst%found;
         close c_pst;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_pst%isopen
         then
            close c_pst;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pst_select_row;

function pst_select_row_upd( i_pst_pty_id   in  bsis_party_status.pty_id%type
                           , o_rt_pst   out bsis_party_status%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pst_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_pst ( i_pst_pty_id   in  bsis_party_status.pty_id%type )
   is
           select *
             from bsis_party_status pst
            where pst.pty_id = i_pst_pty_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_pst( i_pst_pty_id => i_pst_pty_id );
   fetch c_pst into o_rt_pst;
   l_found := c_pst%found;
   close c_pst;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_pst%isopen
      then
         close c_pst;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end pst_select_row_upd;

procedure pst_lock_row( i_pst_pty_id   in  bsis_party_status.pty_id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pst_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_pst ( i_pst_pty_id   in  bsis_party_status.pty_id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from bsis_party_status pst
              where pst.pty_id = i_pst_pty_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_pst_pty_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                pst_lock_row_nowait( i_pst_pty_id => i_pst_pty_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_pst( i_pst_pty_id => i_pst_pty_id );
                  close c_pst;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_pst%isopen
         then
            close c_pst;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pst_lock_row;

procedure pst_lock_row_nowait( i_pst_pty_id   in  bsis_party_status.pty_id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pst_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_pst ( i_pst_pty_id   in  bsis_party_status.pty_id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from bsis_party_status pst
               where pst.pty_id = i_pst_pty_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_pst_pty_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_pst( i_pst_pty_id => i_pst_pty_id );

            close c_pst;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_pst%isopen
        then
           close c_pst;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'PTY_ID = "'||i_pst_pty_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end pst_lock_row_nowait;

;

procedure pst_insert_row ( io_rt_pst  in out bsis_party_status%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pst_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into bsis_party_status( pty_id
                                , status
                                , last_message_received
                                , last_message_sent
                                , dsd_name )
              values ( io_rt_pst.pty_id
                     , io_rt_pst.status
                     , io_rt_pst.last_message_received
                     , io_rt_pst.last_message_sent
                     , io_rt_pst.dsd_name )
           returning pty_id
                   , status
                   , last_message_received
                   , last_message_sent
                   , dsd_name
                into io_rt_pst.pty_id
                   , io_rt_pst.status
                   , io_rt_pst.last_message_received
                   , io_rt_pst.last_message_sent
                   , io_rt_pst.dsd_name;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('PTY_ID = "'||io_rt_pst.pty_id||'"'
                                                             ||', STATUS = "'||io_rt_pst.status||'"'
                                                             ||', LAST_MESSAGE_RECEIVED = "'||io_rt_pst.last_message_received||'"'
                                                             ||', LAST_MESSAGE_SENT = "'||io_rt_pst.last_message_sent||'"'
                                                             ||', DSD_NAME = "'||io_rt_pst.dsd_name||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pst_insert_row;

function pst_perform_update( i_pst_pty_id   in     bsis_party_status.pty_id%type
                           , io_rt_pst  in out bsis_party_status%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pst_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update bsis_party_status
            set pty_id = io_rt_pst.pty_id
              , status = io_rt_pst.status
              , last_message_received = io_rt_pst.last_message_received
              , last_message_sent = io_rt_pst.last_message_sent
              , dsd_name = io_rt_pst.dsd_name
          where pty_id = i_pst_pty_id
      returning pty_id
              , status
              , last_message_received
              , last_message_sent
              , dsd_name
           into io_rt_pst.pty_id
              , io_rt_pst.status
              , io_rt_pst.last_message_received
              , io_rt_pst.last_message_sent
              , io_rt_pst.dsd_name;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('PTY_ID = "'||io_rt_pst.pty_id||'"'
                                                             ||', STATUS = "'||io_rt_pst.status||'"'
                                                             ||', LAST_MESSAGE_RECEIVED = "'||io_rt_pst.last_message_received||'"'
                                                             ||', LAST_MESSAGE_SENT = "'||io_rt_pst.last_message_sent||'"'
                                                             ||', DSD_NAME = "'||io_rt_pst.dsd_name||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pst_perform_update;

function pst_perform_delete( i_pst_pty_id   in  bsis_party_status.pty_id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pst_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from bsis_party_status
          where pty_id = i_pst_pty_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'PTY_ID = "'||i_pst_pty_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end pst_perform_delete;

function pst_update_row( i_pst_pty_id   in     bsis_party_status.pty_id%type
                       , io_rt_pst  in out bsis_party_status%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pst_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         pst_lock_row( i_pst_pty_id   =>  i_pst_pty_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            pst_perform_update( i_pst_pty_id   =>  i_pst_pty_id
                              , io_rt_pst  => io_rt_pst );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('PTY_ID = "'||io_rt_pst.pty_id||'"'
                                                          ||', STATUS = "'||io_rt_pst.status||'"'
                                                          ||', LAST_MESSAGE_RECEIVED = "'||io_rt_pst.last_message_received||'"'
                                                          ||', LAST_MESSAGE_SENT = "'||io_rt_pst.last_message_sent||'"'
                                                          ||', DSD_NAME = "'||io_rt_pst.dsd_name||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end pst_update_row;

function pst_delete_row( i_pst_pty_id   in  bsis_party_status.pty_id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pst_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         pst_lock_row( i_pst_pty_id   =>  i_pst_pty_id );

         
         l_deleted := pst_perform_delete( i_pst_pty_id   =>  i_pst_pty_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'PTY_ID = "'||i_pst_pty_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end pst_delete_row;


end bsis_pst_tapi_pck;
